data.eml:eml: The cladorhizid fauna (Porifera, Poecilosclerida) of the Caribbean and adjacent waters

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hestetun, Jon T., Pomponi, Shirley A., Rapp, Hans Tore (2016): The cladorhizid fauna (Porifera, Poecilosclerida) of the Caribbean and adjacent waters. Zootaxa 4175 (6): 521-538, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4175.6.2
